What’s This All About?

Jan 19, 2020

So this is my blog. I’m going to make it a goal to create informative, self-contained explorations on various topics of interest. Here are some topics I’ll be writing on:

  • Photonics
  • Physics
  • Climbing
  • Mathematics
  • Politics
  • Philosophy
  • My personal life
  • Your personal life
  • Any field in which I don’t have verifiable credentials

I’ll try to get my first post up soon. It will probably either be on Photonics or literally anything else. Beep Boop
